TopicTitle: Do i have enough fuel left for a landing?

Articles.Content: Lacking any detail on your choice of engine and/or fuel tank, I'm gonna go with "no, and you didn't strap on enough parachutes either".

Open the "Delta-V Stats" window, and compare it to the "Delta-V Required" line on the landing guidance.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, and upgrade to MechJeb 2.2, it's out now.
